Original: Original
Dialogue: Dialogue

Original: ???: Wutai troops have hijacked Shinra Express MK93 II. The train is currently headed to Midgar Sector 8. A SOLDIER operative will be inserted to neutralize the situation. We are to proceed as scheduled. Commence mission in 3 2 1 mark. Begin mission. Operative is ready for insertion.
Dialogue: Wutai troops have hijacked Shinra Express MK93 II. The train is currently headed to Midgar Sector 8. A SOLDIER operative will be inserted to neutralize the situation. We are to proceed as scheduled. Commence mission in 3 2 1 mark. Begin mission. Operative is ready for insertion.
trans: 五台部队劫持了神罗快递MK93 II。

Original: ???: The train has been overrun by Wutai troops. Eliminate them and regain control of the train.
Dialogue: The train has been overrun by Wutai troops. Eliminate them and regain control of the train.

Original: ???: Oh yeah!
Dialogue: Oh yeah!

Original: ???: Get serious!
Dialogue: Get serious!

Original: ???: Zack!
Dialogue: Zack!

Original: ???: Zack, focus! There are no Shinra troops on this train. Understood?
Dialogue: Zack, focus! There are no Shinra troops on this train. Understood?

Original: Zack: Hello to you, too!
Dialogue: Hello to you, too!

Original: Zack: Come and get it!
Dialogue: Come and get it!

Original: Zack: SOLDIER 2nd Class Zack, on the job!
Dialogue: SOLDIER 2nd Class Zack, on the job!

Original: ???: Train MK 93 II re-routed to Sector 1 Station near Mako Reactor 1. Proceed to mission phase 2 and change surveillance rank...
Dialogue: Train MK 93 II re-routed to Sector 1 Station near Mako Reactor 1. Proceed to mission phase 2 and change surveillance rank...
trans: Train MK 93 II 改道至 Mako Reactor 1 附近的 Sector 1 Station。继续执行任务阶段 2 并更改监视级别...

Original: Zack: Zack speaking.
Dialogue: Zack speaking.

Original: ???(on the phone): Making progress, Zack?
Dialogue: Making progress, Zack?

Original: Zack: What's going on, Angeal? Why are we fighting Shinra troops?
Dialogue: What's going on, Angeal? Why are we fighting Shinra troops?

Original: Angeal (on the phone): They're Wutai troops in disguise. Now, head to the open area above.
Dialogue: They're Wutai troops in disguise. Now, head to the open area above.

Original: Zack: Towards Sector 8?
Dialogue: Towards Sector 8?

Original: Angeal (on the phone): Yes. But first, you have to clear a path.
Dialogue: Yes. But first, you have to clear a path.

Original: Zack: Clear a path?
Dialogue: Clear a path?

Original: Angeal (on the phone): You'll see what I mean. Be careful.
Dialogue: You'll see what I mean. Be careful.

Original: Angeal (on the phone): Use some discretion.
Dialogue: Use some discretion.

Original: Zack: It's showtime!
Dialogue: It's showtime!

Original: Angeal (on the phone): Not too bad.
Dialogue: Not too bad.

Original: Zack: Piece of cake! I'll make 1st in no time!
Dialogue: Piece of cake! I'll make 1st in no time!

Original: Angeal (on the phone): Go up the stairs at the end of the platform.
Dialogue: Go up the stairs at the end of the platform.
trans: 从平台尽头的楼梯上去。

Original: Zack: You got it!
Dialogue: You got it!

Original: ???: Showing your back to the enemy... Overconfidence will destroy you.
Dialogue: Showing your back to the enemy... Overconfidence will destroy you.
trans: 背对着敌人……过度自信会毁了你。

Original: Zack: Wh-what is this?
Dialogue: Wh-what is this?

Original: Zack: Damn it, you're not the only hero!
Dialogue: Damn it, you're not the only hero!
trans: 该死的，你不是唯一的英雄！

Original: ???: It's over.
Dialogue: It's over.

Original: Angeal: Impossible!
Dialogue: Impossible!

Original: Zack: Thanks, Angeal.
Dialogue: Thanks, Angeal.

Original: Angeal: Training's over.
Dialogue: Training's over.

Original: Zack: Wha? Why?
Dialogue: Wha? Why?

Original: Zack: You serious? I was just getting warmed up!
Dialogue: You serious? I was just getting warmed up!

Original: Angeal: Zack. Embrace your dreams.
Dialogue: Zack. Embrace your dreams.

Original: Zack: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Angeal: If you want to be a hero you need to have dreams...and honor.
Dialogue: If you want to be a hero you need to have dreams...and honor.
trans: 如果你想成为英雄，你需要有梦想……和荣誉。

Original: Zack: Huh.
Dialogue: Huh.

Original: ???: Hey Zack, you seem a little on edge.
Dialogue: Hey Zack, you seem a little on edge.
trans: 嘿扎克，你似乎有点紧张。

Original: Zack: Can you blame me? All this training and no assignments. Like they're hanging me out to dry. You must be pretty busy with everyone off base.
Dialogue: Can you blame me? All this training and no assignments. Like they're hanging me out to dry. You must be pretty busy with everyone off base.

Original: ???: Off-base? Wait, haven't you heard? There's been a mass desertion at SOLDIER.
Dialogue: Off-base? Wait, haven't you heard? There's been a mass desertion at SOLDIER.

Original: Kunsel: It appears one of the 1sts deserted. He took a bunch of 2nds and 3rds with him, too. Nobody knows why he left, or what he's up to. This mass desertion's the reason why your training's on hold.
Dialogue: It appears one of the 1sts deserted. He took a bunch of 2nds and 3rds with him, too. Nobody knows why he left, or what he's up to. This mass desertion's the reason why your training's on hold.
trans: 它似乎是第一批被遗弃的人之一。

Original: Kunsel: Heads up, a 1st!
Dialogue: Heads up, a 1st!

Original: Angeal: Zack, new assignment.
Dialogue: Zack, new assignment.

Original: Zack: Woo! Finally! Some real action!
Dialogue: Woo! Finally! Some real action!

Original: Angeal: This will be your show.
Dialogue: This will be your show.

Original: Zack: Yes!
Dialogue: Yes!

Original: Angeal: Report to Director Lazard. We'll give you the details.
Dialogue: Report to Director Lazard. We'll give you the details.

Original: Lazard: Zack. It's good to finally meet face to face. Lazard, Director of SOLDIER.
Dialogue: Zack. It's good to finally meet face to face. Lazard, Director of SOLDIER.

Original: Zack: Heya!
Dialogue: Heya!

Original: Zack: On to business.
Dialogue: On to business.

Original: Lazard: SOLDIER 1st Class Genesis. A month ago, he went missing during a mission in Wutai. Know anything about this?
Dialogue: SOLDIER 1st Class Genesis. A month ago, he went missing during a mission in Wutai. Know anything about this?

Original: Zack: Not a clue!
Dialogue: Not a clue!

Original: Lazard: The mission is currently stuck in limbo. That's why we've decided to send you.
Dialogue: The mission is currently stuck in limbo. That's why we've decided to send you.

Original: Zack: Uh, to Wutai?
Dialogue: Uh, to Wutai?

Original: Lazard: Yes. This war has gone on long enough.
Dialogue: Yes. This war has gone on long enough.

Original: Angeal (to Zack): I've recommended you for 1st.
Dialogue: I've recommended you for 1st.

Original: Zack: Angeal! I love you man! Ang--
Dialogue: Angeal! I love you man! Ang--

Original: Angeal: Don't make me regret this, Zack.
Dialogue: Don't make me regret this, Zack.

Original: Zack: Sir!
Dialogue: Sir!

Original: Angeal: Once you're packed, you'll leave at once.
Dialogue: Once you're packed, you'll leave at once.
trans: 收拾好行李后，您会立即离开。

Original: Angeal: The operation will begin immediately upon arrival at Wutai. If you have any questions about the assignment or combat in general, you should talk to the other SOLDIER operatives.
Dialogue: The operation will begin immediately upon arrival at Wutai. If you have any questions about the assignment or combat in general, you should talk to the other SOLDIER operatives.
trans: 行动将在抵达五台后立即开始。

Original: Lazard: You will take over the assignment that was given to Genesis. Proceed to Wutai once you've made all the necessary preparations.
Dialogue: You will take over the assignment that was given to Genesis. Proceed to Wutai once you've made all the necessary preparations.
trans: 你将接管交给 Genesis 的任务。

Original: Kunsel: So? Did you read the mail?
Dialogue: So? Did you read the mail?

Original: Zack: Oh, the tutorial mail...
Dialogue: Oh, the tutorial mail...

Original: Kunsel: Well, knowing you, you probably won't remember everything after one read.
Dialogue: Well, knowing you, you probably won't remember everything after one read.
trans: 好吧，了解你，你可能不会在读完之后记住所有内容。

Original: Zack: That's not true...
Dialogue: That's not true...

Original: Kunsel: Well, read it when you need to refresh your memory. It'll come in handy, I promise. By the way, the materia you were using in training have been confiscated. Powerful materia have to be earned on your own. Those are the SOLDIER rules.
Dialogue: Well, read it when you need to refresh your memory. It'll come in handy, I promise. By the way, the materia you were using in training have been confiscated. Powerful materia have to be earned on your own. Those are the SOLDIER rules.
trans: 好吧，当你需要刷新记忆的时候读一读。

Original: Kunsel: The next thing you have to know about are the special tasks classified as "missions." Put simply, these are errands that the company assigns to SOLDIER operatives. To participate in missions, you have to register your personal information on the mission board. After you register, you can check missions on your handset. Come on, I'll show you how to register on the mission board.
Dialogue: The next thing you have to know about are the special tasks classified as "missions." Put simply, these are errands that the company assigns to SOLDIER operatives. To participate in missions, you have to register your personal information on the mission board. After you register, you can check missions on your handset. Come on, I'll show you how to register on the mission board.
trans: 接下来你必须知道的是被归类为“任务”的特殊任务。

Original: Angeal: Good grief... You haven't even registered for missions? Go do that now.
Dialogue: Good grief... You haven't even registered for missions? Go do that now.
trans: 天啊……你连任务都没登记？

Original: SOLDIER 3rd Class: Time is of the essence. Please complete your preparations swiftly.
Dialogue: Time is of the essence. Please complete your preparations swiftly.

Original: Kunsel: This is the mission board. Here, try registering yourself now.
Dialogue: This is the mission board. Here, try registering yourself now.

Original: Kunsel: Now that you're registered, you should try doing a mission.
Dialogue: Now that you're registered, you should try doing a mission.
trans: 现在你已经注册了，你应该尝试执行任务。

Original: Zack: Sounds like a good idea. I'll do that right now.
Dialogue: Sounds like a good idea. I'll do that right now.

Original: Kunsel: The Save Point is that way. If you're unsure about combat during missions, you should read the tutorial mail I sent you.
Dialogue: The Save Point is that way. If you're unsure about combat during missions, you should read the tutorial mail I sent you.

Original: Angeal: You want to do a few missions for practice? Alright, hurry up, then.
Dialogue: You want to do a few missions for practice? Alright, hurry up, then.

Original: Kunsel: Looks like you cleared a mission. Nice work.
Dialogue: Looks like you cleared a mission. Nice work.
trans: 看起来你完成了一个任务。

Original: Zack: It was so easy, I could have done it blindfolded!
Dialogue: It was so easy, I could have done it blindfolded!
trans: 太简单了，我蒙着眼睛也能做到！

Original: Kunsel: Ha ha ha! You're the man, Zack. I'll be waiting to hear your exploits on this Wutai assignment. Oh, I almost forgot.
Dialogue: Ha ha ha! You're the man, Zack. I'll be waiting to hear your exploits on this Wutai assignment. Oh, I almost forgot.

Original: Kunsel: I never explained these supply pods to you, did I? In this supply pods are items you can use in battle. The company sends them to us periodically.
Dialogue: I never explained these supply pods to you, did I? In this supply pods are items you can use in battle. The company sends them to us periodically.
trans: 我从来没有向你解释过这些供应舱，是吗？

Original: Zack: I see. They're like provisions for SOLDIER members.
Dialogue: I see. They're like provisions for SOLDIER members.

Original: Kunsel: It'd be a shame to squander the company's good will. Check it out before you go on assignment. I wonder what they gave us this time?
Dialogue: It'd be a shame to squander the company's good will. Check it out before you go on assignment. I wonder what they gave us this time?
trans: 浪费公司的善意将是一种耻辱。

Original: Angeal: Did you check the supply pods? You would be wise to take provisions when they're made available to you.
Dialogue: Did you check the supply pods? You would be wise to take provisions when they're made available to you.

Original: Kunsel: All right, looks like you're ready to go. Lastly, I'll tell you about mail.
Dialogue: All right, looks like you're ready to go. Lastly, I'll tell you about mail.
trans: 好吧，看起来你准备好了。

Original: Kunsel: Just now, I sent a mail to your handset. We can exchange information this way. You can also get messages from Director Lazard and company news via mail. Check it regularly. And who knows--maybe you'll get mail from friends you make along the way.
Dialogue: Just now, I sent a mail to your handset. We can exchange information this way. You can also get messages from Director Lazard and company news via mail. Check it regularly. And who knows--maybe you'll get mail from friends you make along the way.
trans: 刚才，我给你的手机发了一封邮件。

Original: Kunsel: But don't just read mail that you get from girls! Well, I guess that's everything. Looks like it's time for you to head out. You're going with Angeal, right? Good luck on the assignment!
Dialogue: But don't just read mail that you get from girls! Well, I guess that's everything. Looks like it's time for you to head out. You're going with Angeal, right? Good luck on the assignment!
trans: 但是不要只读你从女孩那里收到的邮件！

Original: Zack: Yeah! Thanks for all the information!
Dialogue: Yeah! Thanks for all the information!

Original: Kunsel: Now Zack, don't get greedy. There's a limit to how much free stuff you can get. The company isn't stupid, you know.
Dialogue: Now Zack, don't get greedy. There's a limit to how much free stuff you can get. The company isn't stupid, you know.

Original: Kunsel: Fine, fine, if you want items so badly, I'll give you what I got in my pod today.
Dialogue: Fine, fine, if you want items so badly, I'll give you what I got in my pod today.
trans: 好吧，好吧，如果你非常想要物品，我会给你我今天在我的吊舱里得到的东西。

Original: Angeal: We have to leave for Wutai soon. Are you ready?
Dialogue: We have to leave for Wutai soon. Are you ready?
trans: 我们很快就要动身去五台了。

Original: Zack: Um, preparations...?
Dialogue: Um, preparations...?

Original: Lazard: I'll be joining you as well. I'm counting on you.
Dialogue: I'll be joining you as well. I'm counting on you.

Original: Zack: Sir!
Dialogue: Sir!

Original: Lazard: By the way, what is your dream? "To become 1st"...is it?
Dialogue: By the way, what is your dream? "To become 1st"...is it?
trans: 顺便问一下，你的梦想是什么？

Original: Zack: No... To become a hero!
Dialogue: No... To become a hero!

Original: Lazard: Ah, good! Unattainable dreams are the best kind.
Dialogue: Ah, good! Unattainable dreams are the best kind.

Original: Zack: Uh, thanks?
Dialogue: Uh, thanks?

Original: Angeal: Fort Tamblin is straight ahead. Let's hurry, B Unit is standing by.
Dialogue: Fort Tamblin is straight ahead. Let's hurry, B Unit is standing by.

Original: Wutai Private: You two! Identify yourselves!
Dialogue: You two! Identify yourselves!

Original: Zack: Just leave it to me!
Dialogue: Just leave it to me!

Original: Zack: All right, next!
Dialogue: All right, next!

Original: Angeal: Calm down, Zack.
Dialogue: Calm down, Zack.

Original: Angeal: Zack... Do you know about dumbapples?
Dialogue: Zack... Do you know about dumbapples?

Original: Zack: No, what is that?
Dialogue: No, what is that?

Original: Angeal: Unbelievable... How can you not know about dumbapples? You'll never make 1st at that rate.
Dialogue: Unbelievable... How can you not know about dumbapples? You'll never make 1st at that rate.
trans: 难以置信……你怎么会不知道dumbapple？

Original: Zack: Whoa, wait! What are dumbapples!?
Dialogue: Whoa, wait! What are dumbapples!?

Original: Zack: So Angeal, what's the deal with "dumbapples"?
Dialogue: So Angeal, what's the deal with "dumbapples"?

Original: Angeal: The official name is Banora White. The trees bear fruit at random times during the year. Because of that, the townspeople affectionately call them dumbapples. The local farms had plenty of them to spare.
Dialogue: The official name is Banora White. The trees bear fruit at random times during the year. Because of that, the townspeople affectionately call them dumbapples. The local farms had plenty of them to spare.

Original: Zack: Oh, really? So you stole them.
Dialogue: Oh, really? So you stole them.

Original: Angeal: We were poor, Zack.
Dialogue: We were poor, Zack.

Original: Zack: Nice excuse!
Dialogue: Nice excuse!

Original: Angeal: But even then, I had my honor. The largest Banora White tree grew on a wealthy man's estate. It was rumored that those apples tasted the best. But I never stole from that tree, because the wealthy man's son was my friend.
Dialogue: But even then, I had my honor. The largest Banora White tree grew on a wealthy man's estate. It was rumored that those apples tasted the best. But I never stole from that tree, because the wealthy man's son was my friend.
trans: 但即便如此，我也有我的荣幸。

Original: Zack: If he was a friend, you should have just asked for some!
Dialogue: If he was a friend, you should have just asked for some!
trans: 如果他是朋友，你应该只是问一些！

Original: Angeal: Honor can be quite a burden at times.
Dialogue: Honor can be quite a burden at times.
trans: 荣誉有时会成为一种负担。

Original: Zack: ...And what exactly does this have to do with me?
Dialogue: ...And what exactly does this have to do with me?

Original: Angeal: No story is not worth hearing.
Dialogue: No story is not worth hearing.

Original: Zack: What? That's it? Yeah, well, thanks a lot!
Dialogue: What? That's it? Yeah, well, thanks a lot!

Original: Angeal: B Unit will set off an explosion. That's our cue.
Dialogue: B Unit will set off an explosion. That's our cue.

Original: Zack: The diversion will allow us to infiltrate.
Dialogue: The diversion will allow us to infiltrate.
trans: 转移将使我们能够渗透。

Original: Angeal: Right. I'll set the bomb inside the fortress. You'll charge the front gate, and...
Dialogue: Right. I'll set the bomb inside the fortress. You'll charge the front gate, and...

Original: Zack: Uh-huh, and? And? And? And?
Dialogue: Uh-huh, and? And? And? And?

Original: Angeal: Indulge yourself.
Dialogue: Indulge yourself.

Original: Zack: You got it! That's what I do best! Come on, B Unit...
Dialogue: You got it! That's what I do best! Come on, B Unit...

Original: Zack: You know, I've never actually seen you use that. Don't you think it's sort of a waste?
Dialogue: You know, I've never actually seen you use that. Don't you think it's sort of a waste?
trans: 你知道，我从来没有真正看到你使用它。

Original: Angeal: Use brings about wear...tear...and rust. And that's a real waste.
Dialogue: Use brings about wear...tear...and rust. And that's a real waste.
trans: 使用会导致磨损……撕裂……和生锈。

Original: Zack: You're serious, aren't you?
Dialogue: You're serious, aren't you?

Original: Angeal: Yeah. I can be pretty cheap.
Dialogue: Yeah. I can be pretty cheap.

Original: Zack: Yeah, no kidding...
Dialogue: Yeah, no kidding...

Original: Angeal: Begin mission.
Dialogue: Begin mission.

Original: Wutai Sergeant: No one passes beyond this point! The enemy is but one man! Obliterate him!
Dialogue: No one passes beyond this point! The enemy is but one man! Obliterate him!

Original: Zack: All right! Piece of cake!
Dialogue: All right! Piece of cake!

Original: Wutai Private: Enemy attack! It's SOLDIER! Don't let him get through!
Dialogue: Enemy attack! It's SOLDIER! Don't let him get through!

Original: Angeal (on the phone): Were you able to get inside the fortress?
Dialogue: Were you able to get inside the fortress?

Original: Zack: Piece of cake! I could have done it blindfolded!
Dialogue: Piece of cake! I could have done it blindfolded!

Original: Angeal (on the phone): Don't get too careless. I've heard that the Wutai keep a large monster for anti-SOLDIER purposes. It should be somewhere inside Fort Tamblin.
Dialogue: Don't get too careless. I've heard that the Wutai keep a large monster for anti-SOLDIER purposes. It should be somewhere inside Fort Tamblin.

Original: Zack: If I take it out, do you think I'll make 1st?
Dialogue: If I take it out, do you think I'll make 1st?
trans: 如果我把它拿出来，你认为我会成为第一名吗？

Original: Angeal: It depends on the quality of work. Your main duty is to draw the Wutai troops to you by running amok. Do that well, and the director will give you a favorable evaluation.
Dialogue: It depends on the quality of work. Your main duty is to draw the Wutai troops to you by running amok. Do that well, and the director will give you a favorable evaluation.

Original: Zack: Oh, that'll be easy! Just leave it to me!
Dialogue: Oh, that'll be easy! Just leave it to me!

Original: Wutai Sergeant (1): To think one SOLDIER operative did this much damage to us... It seems I can no longer just sit back and watch.
Dialogue: To think one SOLDIER operative did this much damage to us... It seems I can no longer just sit back and watch.
trans: 想不到一名士兵特工对我们造成了如此大的伤害……看来我不能再坐视了。

Original: Wutai Sergeant (1): Ha!
Dialogue: Ha!

Original: Wutai Sergeant (1): Halt!
Dialogue: Halt!

Original: Wutai Sergeant (2): You'll pay for what you did to my men! I'll make sure you never leave this place alive!
Dialogue: You'll pay for what you did to my men! I'll make sure you never leave this place alive!
trans: 你会为你对我手下的所作所为付出代价的！

Original: Wutai Sergeant (3): He's no match for three Wutai sergeants! Let's take him out!
Dialogue: He's no match for three Wutai sergeants! Let's take him out!
trans: 他不是三个五台军士的对手！

Original: All 3 Wutai Sergeants (in unison): We'll show you the true power of Wutai!
Dialogue: We'll show you the true power of Wutai!
trans: 让你见识一下五台的真正实力！

Original: Lazard: We have new intel. Enemy troops have also been detected at the two towers within the fortress.
Dialogue: We have new intel. Enemy troops have also been detected at the two towers within the fortress.

Original: Zack: Well, that makes sense. I just took out one of those towers.
Dialogue: Well, that makes sense. I just took out one of those towers.

Original: Lazard: You'll have to look for the other tower. Otherwise, the enemy can easily track your position.
Dialogue: You'll have to look for the other tower. Otherwise, the enemy can easily track your position.

Original: Wutai Private: There he is!
Dialogue: There he is!

Original: Wutai Private: Open fire!
Dialogue: Open fire!

Original: Wutai Sergeant (to Wutai Privates): This way! Follow me!
Dialogue: This way! Follow me!

Original: Wutai Sergeant: Attack if you dare, SOLDIER scum! You will fall by our hands! Huh? Where did he go? Sneaky little pest!
Dialogue: Attack if you dare, SOLDIER scum! You will fall by our hands! Huh? Where did he go? Sneaky little pest!
trans: 如果你敢攻击，士兵败类！

Original: Wutai Sergeant: Ngh! What treachery!
Dialogue: Ngh! What treachery!

Original: Lazard (on the phone): This is Lazard. Enemy troops appear to be lurking in every corner. The fortress will not go down easily.
Dialogue: This is Lazard. Enemy troops appear to be lurking in every corner. The fortress will not go down easily.

Original: Zack: It appears that way. I was just assaulted while I was checking a revolving wall.
Dialogue: It appears that way. I was just assaulted while I was checking a revolving wall.

Original: Lazard (on the phone): There may be similar traps set up at the other walls. Proceed with caution.
Dialogue: There may be similar traps set up at the other walls. Proceed with caution.
trans: 其他墙壁上可能设置了类似的陷阱。

Original: Wutai Private: There he is!
Dialogue: There he is!

Original: Wutai Sergeant (1): SOLDIER operative sighted! He's under the tower!
Dialogue: SOLDIER operative sighted! He's under the tower!

Original: Wutai Sergeant (2): So that's where you are! 38th Tamblin Unit, charge!
Dialogue: So that's where you are! 38th Tamblin Unit, charge!

Original: Wutai Sergeant: We have to make our stand here! Ready! Aim! Fire! End of the line, SOLDIER! Reinforcements are coming! You can't escape!
Dialogue: We have to make our stand here! Ready! Aim! Fire! End of the line, SOLDIER! Reinforcements are coming! You can't escape!

Original: Zack: What to do...
Dialogue: What to do...

Original: Wutai Private: Sergeant! He's coming this way!
Dialogue: Sergeant! He's coming this way!

Original: Wutai Sergeant: Do not falter! Charge him!
Dialogue: Do not falter! Charge him!

Original: Wutai Sergeant: Tch! Damn you!
Dialogue: Tch! Damn you!

Original: Wutai Sergeant: Long live the Wutai...
Dialogue: Long live the Wutai...

Original: Zack: Hm? I hear voices...
Dialogue: Hm? I hear voices...

Original: Wutai Sergeant: In the name of Wutai, we must halt the enemy advance here.
Dialogue: In the name of Wutai, we must halt the enemy advance here.
trans: 以五台之名，我们必须阻止敌人在这里前进。

Original: Wutai Private: Sir!
Dialogue: Sir!

Original: Wutai Sergeant: Fort Tamblin will not fall to a paltry force like SOLDIER. The enemy could be lurking anywhere. Keep your eyes open. SOLDIER is a formidable foe. But to protect our homeland, we must stand against our enemies, no matter how powerful they may be. Even if it means our lives. Retreat is not in the Wutai dictionary! Huh!?
Dialogue: Fort Tamblin will not fall to a paltry force like SOLDIER. The enemy could be lurking anywhere. Keep your eyes open. SOLDIER is a formidable foe. But to protect our homeland, we must stand against our enemies, no matter how powerful they may be. Even if it means our lives. Retreat is not in the Wutai dictionary! Huh!?
trans: 坦布林堡不会落入像士兵这样微不足道的力量。

Original: Wutai Sergeant: Retreat! Retreating is a part of military strategy!
Dialogue: Retreat! Retreating is a part of military strategy!

Original: Lazard (on the phone): It appears, you're doing well, Zack. The enemy forces in Fort Tamblin have essentially been reduced to half. There are still some enemy units roaming about, but you can proceed to the central area if you like.
Dialogue: It appears, you're doing well, Zack. The enemy forces in Fort Tamblin have essentially been reduced to half. There are still some enemy units roaming about, but you can proceed to the central area if you like.

Original: Zack: What should I do?
Dialogue: What should I do?

Original: Lazard: Understood. Search for the remaining enemy units and eliminate them quickly.
Dialogue: Understood. Search for the remaining enemy units and eliminate them quickly.

Original: Lazard: Understood. Proceed further into the fortress. But be careful--the enemy is hurt, but not down.
Dialogue: Understood. Proceed further into the fortress. But be careful--the enemy is hurt, but not down.

Original: Lazard (on the phone): Well done, Zack. We have successfully occupied Fort Tamblin. I was really only expecting you to get their attention. Most impressive I must say. I'm very pleased with the results thus far. Proceed to the next objective.
Dialogue: Well done, Zack. We have successfully occupied Fort Tamblin. I was really only expecting you to get their attention. Most impressive I must say. I'm very pleased with the results thus far. Proceed to the next objective.

Original: Zack: Ah! That must be the central area!
Dialogue: Ah! That must be the central area!

Original: Zack: What's this?
Dialogue: What's this?

Original: Crescent Unit Captain: That is Wutai's greatest deity, Leviathan. We are the Crescent, the Wutai army's elite unit. We appease the wrath of Leviathan, and smite the enemies of Wutai. Our beloved homeland has been brutally ravaged by Shinra.
Dialogue: That is Wutai's greatest deity, Leviathan. We are the Crescent, the Wutai army's elite unit. We appease the wrath of Leviathan, and smite the enemies of Wutai. Our beloved homeland has been brutally ravaged by Shinra.
trans: 那就是五台最伟大的神，利维坦。

Original: Zack: I heard that if we could process the mako here, it would help people live better lives. But then you attacked us without even hearing us out!
Dialogue: I heard that if we could process the mako here, it would help people live better lives. But then you attacked us without even hearing us out!
trans: 我听说如果我们能在这里加工魔芋，那将有助于人们过上更好的生活。

Original: Crescent Unit Captain: What do you know of the pain we have suffered? Shinra has continually brought fear and oppression to the innocent people of Wutai!
Dialogue: What do you know of the pain we have suffered? Shinra has continually brought fear and oppression to the innocent people of Wutai!
trans: 你知道我们所受的痛苦吗？

Original: Zack: ...

Crescent Unit Captain: I would like to ask you one last thing. Are you satisfied in using your immense power to serve an evil organization like Shinra? Does it bring you joy to torture innocent people?
Dialogue: I would like to ask you one last thing. Are you satisfied in using your immense power to serve an evil organization like Shinra? Does it bring you joy to torture innocent people?

Original: Zack: That's not what I...
Dialogue: That's not what I...

Original: Crescent Unit Captain: If there is any remorse in your heart, then atone for your actions by joining our cause!
Dialogue: If there is any remorse in your heart, then atone for your actions by joining our cause!
trans: 如果你心中有任何悔恨，那就加入我们的事业来为你的行为赎罪吧！

Original: Zack: ...
Crescent Unit Captain: Of course, we cannot pay you much, but you can use your power in the name of justice!
Dialogue: Of course, we cannot pay you much, but you can use your power in the name of justice!
trans: 当然，我们不能给你太多报酬，但你可以以正义的名义使用你的力量！

Original: Zack: Justice...? Is that really the case? Is it so terrible to provide mako to people and make their lives better? I don't know... But I chose to serve Shinra. Whatever happens, I have to stand by that decision.
Dialogue: Justice...? Is that really the case? Is it so terrible to provide mako to people and make their lives better? I don't know... But I chose to serve Shinra. Whatever happens, I have to stand by that decision.

Original: Crescent Unit Captain: I was foolish to think I could reason with villains. For those of us born and raised in Wutai, losing our land is the same as losing our lives. Hence, I must eliminate you, as my last duty to the land. You will now witness the wrath of Wutai!
Dialogue: I was foolish to think I could reason with villains. For those of us born and raised in Wutai, losing our land is the same as losing our lives. Hence, I must eliminate you, as my last duty to the land. You will now witness the wrath of Wutai!
trans: 我愚蠢地认为我可以和恶棍讲道理。

Original: Crescent Unit Captain: Why do you not finish me?
Dialogue: Why do you not finish me?

Original: Zack: I don't know. Not in the mood, I guess.
Dialogue: I don't know. Not in the mood, I guess.

Original: Crescent Unit Captain: As long as we breathe, we will continue to target Shinra. I promise...one day, I will have your head.
Dialogue: As long as we breathe, we will continue to target Shinra. I promise...one day, I will have your head.
trans: 只要我们还有一口气，我们就会继续针对神罗。

Original: Zack: Fine, I'll be waiting.
Dialogue: Fine, I'll be waiting.

Original: ???: One, avoid unnecessary training! Two, protect Wutai at all costs! Three, ugly Shinra SOLDIER dudes... ...must be PUNISHED!
Dialogue: One, avoid unnecessary training! Two, protect Wutai at all costs! Three, ugly Shinra SOLDIER dudes... ...must be PUNISHED!

Original: Zack: Who are you?
Dialogue: Who are you?

Original: Yuffie: I'm Wutai's greatest warrior! If you wanna go further, you have to go through me!
Dialogue: I'm Wutai's greatest warrior! If you wanna go further, you have to go through me!
trans: 我是五台最伟大的战士！

Original: Zack: A kid...? You shouldn't be playing here, it's dangerous! Go home to your parents.
Dialogue: A kid...? You shouldn't be playing here, it's dangerous! Go home to your parents.

Original: Yuffie: You're the one who's going home! If you insist on going any further, you'll have a fight on your hands!
Dialogue: You're the one who's going home! If you insist on going any further, you'll have a fight on your hands!

Original: Zack: Oh, man... What am I supposed to do here?
Dialogue: Oh, man... What am I supposed to do here?
trans: 哦，伙计...我应该在这里做什么？

Original: Yuffie: Whap! Pow! Bam! Take that, bad guy!
Dialogue: Whap! Pow! Bam! Take that, bad guy!

Original: Zack: ... Arrrgh! Nooo! You got me!
Dialogue: ... Arrrgh! Nooo! You got me!

Original: Yuffie: There! That'll teach you to mess with me! Once again, I've brought peace to Wutai!
Dialogue: There! That'll teach you to mess with me! Once again, I've brought peace to Wutai!

Original: Zack: Boy oh boy... You gotta admire that energy... Well, back to work, I guess...
Dialogue: Boy oh boy... You gotta admire that energy... Well, back to work, I guess...
trans: 男孩哦男孩...你必须佩服那种能量...好吧，回去工作吧，我想...

Original: Zack: You must be the anti-SOLDIER monsters I've been hearing about.
Dialogue: You must be the anti-SOLDIER monsters I've been hearing about.
trans: 你一定是我听说过的反士兵怪物。

Original: Zack: SOLDIER 2nd Class Zack, victorious once again!
Dialogue: SOLDIER 2nd Class Zack, victorious once again!

Original: Angeal (on the phone): Good work. Now, get out of there quickly. There's only 5 minutes until detonation.
Dialogue: Good work. Now, get out of there quickly. There's only 5 minutes until detonation.

Original: Zack: Understood!
Dialogue: Understood!

Original: Zack: Director Lazard, are you watching? Gotta move!
Dialogue: Director Lazard, are you watching? Gotta move!

Original: Zack: No time to play!
Dialogue: No time to play!

Original: Zack: Not good...
Dialogue: Not good...

Original: Angeal: That's one more you owe me. You lost your focus.
Dialogue: That's one more you owe me. You lost your focus.

Original: Zack: Uh, yeah? Oh, sorry if your sword got any wear, tear, or rust on it.
Dialogue: Uh, yeah? Oh, sorry if your sword got any wear, tear, or rust on it.

Original: Angeal: You're a little more important than my sword. ...But just a little.
Dialogue: You're a little more important than my sword. ...But just a little.

Original: Zack: Thanks!
Dialogue: Thanks!

Original: Lazard: Sorry to keep you waiting. I'm not used to being on site.
Dialogue: Sorry to keep you waiting. I'm not used to being on site.

Original: Angeal: You didn't have to come.
Dialogue: You didn't have to come.

Original: Lazard: This operation will bring an end to the war. I have to see it through personally. SOLDIER 2nd Class Zack.
Dialogue: This operation will bring an end to the war. I have to see it through personally. SOLDIER 2nd Class Zack.

Original: Zack: Sir!
Dialogue: Sir!

Original: Lazard: You performed your duties admirably at Fort Tamblin. I saw it with my own eyes. Frankly, my evaluation of you is...
Dialogue: You performed your duties admirably at Fort Tamblin. I saw it with my own eyes. Frankly, my evaluation of you is...
trans: 你在坦布林堡出色地履行了职责。

Original: Lazard: ... Thank goodness for you, Angeal! Were it not for your efforts, the operation would have failed. Ahh yes, how very fortunate that you were here!
Dialogue: ... Thank goodness for you, Angeal! Were it not for your efforts, the operation would have failed. Ahh yes, how very fortunate that you were here!

Original: Lazard: You supported Angeal well by diverting the enemy. An acceptable level of work for a 2nd. Be ready for your next assignment.
Dialogue: You supported Angeal well by diverting the enemy. An acceptable level of work for a 2nd. Be ready for your next assignment.
trans: 你通过转移敌人很好地支持了Angeal。

Original: Angeal: Zack, do you know the difference between a 1st and a 2nd?
Dialogue: Zack, do you know the difference between a 1st and a 2nd?
trans: 扎克，你知道一等奖和二等奖的区别吗？

Original: Angeal: A SOLDIER 1st Class performs above and beyond the call of duty at all times. Remember that.
Dialogue: A SOLDIER 1st Class performs above and beyond the call of duty at all times. Remember that.
trans: 一等兵的表现始终超出职责范围。

Original: Lazard: You took out a lot of enemy units for us. You exceeded my expectations. Keep up the good work, and perhaps the day you make 1st will not be far off. You were right, Angeal. He is quite a promising prospect.
Dialogue: You took out a lot of enemy units for us. You exceeded my expectations. Keep up the good work, and perhaps the day you make 1st will not be far off. You were right, Angeal. He is quite a promising prospect.
trans: 你为我们干掉了很多敌方单位。

Original: Angeal: Heh... This is just the beginning.
Dialogue: Heh... This is just the beginning.

Original: Lazard: I can say this now, but when you first came to me with the recommendation, I was hesitant. I thought for sure that all he was good for was doing squats.
Dialogue: I can say this now, but when you first came to me with the recommendation, I was hesitant. I thought for sure that all he was good for was doing squats.
trans: 我现在可以这么说，但是当你第一次来找我推荐时，我很犹豫。

Original: Lazard: You are a frightening individual. Not any man could annihilate an entire enemy force by himself.
Dialogue: You are a frightening individual. Not any man could annihilate an entire enemy force by himself.

Original: Angeal: I was taken aback myself. You really have grown into a fine warrior.
Dialogue: I was taken aback myself. You really have grown into a fine warrior.

Original: Zack: Your bravery during the Wutai war will be remembered for generations to come. It seems your dream of becoming a hero has already come true.
Dialogue: Your bravery during the Wutai war will be remembered for generations to come. It seems your dream of becoming a hero has already come true.
trans: 你在五台之战中的勇敢，将被后代铭记。

Original: Angeal: Let's not get carried away, Director. Zack still has a lot to accomplish.
Dialogue: Let's not get carried away, Director. Zack still has a lot to accomplish.
trans: 我们不要得意忘形，导演。

Original: Lazard: Ha ha, I suppose you're right. Zack, I hope you'll continue to excel.
Dialogue: Ha ha, I suppose you're right. Zack, I hope you'll continue to excel.

Original: Angeal: Now, let's hurry. Sephiroth is waiting.
Dialogue: Now, let's hurry. Sephiroth is waiting.

Original: Zack: Sephiroth!? The SOLDIER hero? Wow! I get to meet a hero!
Dialogue: Sephiroth!? The SOLDIER hero? Wow! I get to meet a hero!

Original: Angeal: Zack! Come on!
Dialogue: Zack! Come on!

Original: Angeal: Take the director to a safe place.
Dialogue: Take the director to a safe place.
trans: 把导演带到安全的地方。

Original: Lazard: Then contact Sephiroth.
Dialogue: Then contact Sephiroth.

Original: Angeal: Zack is more than enough. Now, go.
Dialogue: Zack is more than enough. Now, go.

Original: Zack: Follow me, Director.
Dialogue: Follow me, Director.

Original: Infantryman: Thank goodness you're safe, Director Lazard.
Dialogue: Thank goodness you're safe, Director Lazard.
trans: 谢天谢地，拉扎德主管，你平安无事。

Original: Lazard: I should be fine now, Zack. Go and assist Angeal!
Dialogue: I should be fine now, Zack. Go and assist Angeal!
trans: 我现在应该没事了，扎克。

Original: Zack: I know, I know!
Dialogue: I know, I know!

Original: Zack: Okay, let's go!
Dialogue: Okay, let's go!

Original: Zack: Angeal? Angeal! What? These guys aren't Wutai troops...
Dialogue: Angeal? Angeal! What? These guys aren't Wutai troops...

Original: Zack: A summon? Who called it out?
Dialogue: A summon? Who called it out?

Original: Zack: Holy...
Dialogue: Holy...

Original: Sephiroth: Genesis...
Dialogue: Genesis...

Original: Zack: The missing SOLDIER 1st Class?
Dialogue: The missing SOLDIER 1st Class?

Original: Zack: They're identical!
Dialogue: They're identical!

Original: Sephiroth: A Genesis copy...
Dialogue: A Genesis copy...

Original: Zack: Copy? A human copy?
Dialogue: Copy? A human copy?

Original: Sephiroth: Where is Angeal?
Dialogue: Where is Angeal?

Original: Zack: I thought he was fighting around here...
Dialogue: I thought he was fighting around here...

Original: Sephiroth: Humph, so he's gone, too.
Dialogue: Humph, so he's gone, too.

Original: Zack: What? Wait, what does that mean?
Dialogue: What? Wait, what does that mean?

Original: Sephiroth: It means Angeal has betrayed us as well.
Dialogue: It means Angeal has betrayed us as well.
trans: 这意味着Angeal也背叛了我们。

Original: Zack: No way! I know what kind of guy Angeal is. And he'd never do that!
Dialogue: No way! I know what kind of guy Angeal is. And he'd never do that!

Original: Zack: Angeal wouldn't betray us! Never!
Dialogue: Angeal wouldn't betray us! Never!

Original: ???: Man, what is with Angeal? How long is he gonna slack off like this? It's been a month now! Sephiroth's got it all wrong, too! Lumping Angeal together with Genesis! Genesis is a deserter who took a bunch of 2nds and 3rds with him! He used his copies to attack us! Angeal would never condone something like that! He valued his SOLDIER honor more than anyone else! Ugh! Everything's so messed up these days! Angeal! Just come back, please!
Dialogue: Man, what is with Angeal? How long is he gonna slack off like this? It's been a month now! Sephiroth's got it all wrong, too! Lumping Angeal together with Genesis! Genesis is a deserter who took a bunch of 2nds and 3rds with him! He used his copies to attack us! Angeal would never condone something like that! He valued his SOLDIER honor more than anyone else! Ugh! Everything's so messed up these days! Angeal! Just come back, please!

Original: ???(on the phone): SOLDIER 2nd Class Zack?
Dialogue: SOLDIER 2nd Class Zack?

Original: Zack: That would be me. Who is this?
Dialogue: That would be me. Who is this?

Original: ???(on the phone): Director Lazard wants to see you. Go to the briefing room.
Dialogue: Director Lazard wants to see you. Go to the briefing room.

Original: Zack: Hey! Wait! Who was that?
Dialogue: Hey! Wait! Who was that?

Original: Zack: Any word on Angeal?
Dialogue: Any word on Angeal?
trans: 有关于 Angeal 的消息吗？

Original: Lazard: He hasn't contacted his family either.
Dialogue: He hasn't contacted his family either.
trans: 他也没有联系过他的家人。

Original: Zack: So, what's this about?
Dialogue: So, what's this about?

Original: Lazard: A new assignment. I want you to go to the hometown of our missing SOLDIER 1st Class, Genesis.
Dialogue: A new assignment. I want you to go to the hometown of our missing SOLDIER 1st Class, Genesis.

Original: Zack: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Lazard: According to the parents, they've had no contact with Genesis whatsoever. But, they can't be trusted.
Dialogue: According to the parents, they've had no contact with Genesis whatsoever. But, they can't be trusted.
trans: 根据父母的说法，他们与 Genesis 没有任何联系。

Original: Zack: Why?
Dialogue: Why?

Original: Lazard: They're his family. I had already dispatched some staff, but we've lost contact. I want you to go and investigate. He will go with you.
Dialogue: They're his family. I had already dispatched some staff, but we've lost contact. I want you to go and investigate. He will go with you.

Original: Tseng: Tseng, of the Turks.
Dialogue: Tseng, of the Turks.

Original: Zack: This job is looking really gloomy...
Dialogue: This job is looking really gloomy...
trans: 这份工作看起来真的很阴沉......

Original: Tseng: Let me know when you're ready to go.
Dialogue: Let me know when you're ready to go.
trans: 准备好出发时请告诉我。

Original: Zack: Oh, excuse me... Hello?
Dialogue: Oh, excuse me... Hello?

Original: Kunsel (on the phone): Yeah, this is Kunsel. Did you ready my mail?
Dialogue: Yeah, this is Kunsel. Did you ready my mail?

Original: Zack: Not yet. I'll read it later. I'm kinda in a meeting right now--
Dialogue: Not yet. I'll read it later. I'm kinda in a meeting right now--

Original: Kunsel (on the phone): Ah, gotcha. Hey, can I talk to you after that, though?
Dialogue: Ah, gotcha. Hey, can I talk to you after that, though?

Original: Zack: Well... If you keep it short, I guess. Haven't got much time.
Dialogue: Well... If you keep it short, I guess. Haven't got much time.
trans: 嗯...如果你保持简短，我猜。

Original: Kunsel (on the phone): Yeah yeah, it'll be short. I'll be right outside the briefing room.
Dialogue: Yeah yeah, it'll be short. I'll be right outside the briefing room.

Original: SOLDIER 2nd Class: Before you go out on a mission, you should always check the supply pod. We don't get notified when it's been restocked. (Rumor has it that it's to cut costs.)
Dialogue: Before you go out on a mission, you should always check the supply pod. We don't get notified when it's been restocked. (Rumor has it that it's to cut costs.)
trans: 在你出去执行任务之前，你应该经常检查补给箱。

Original: Kunsel: Hey, Zack. What do you say we go down to Sector 8? You can go to Sector 8 through the first floor entrance as well. Let's head over. You should always go do as much as you can before an assignment, so you have no regrets.
Dialogue: Hey, Zack. What do you say we go down to Sector 8? You can go to Sector 8 through the first floor entrance as well. Let's head over. You should always go do as much as you can before an assignment, so you have no regrets.

Original: Kunsel: Well, here we are in Sector 8. I guess we should split up here.
Dialogue: Well, here we are in Sector 8. I guess we should split up here.
trans: 好吧，我们在第 8 区。我想我们应该在这里分开。

Original: Zack: What? You bring me out here, and now you're leaving me?
Dialogue: What? You bring me out here, and now you're leaving me?

Original: Kunsel: You do have an assignment waiting, don't you? Wouldn't it be quicker to go around just by yourself? The Shinra Building is straight ahead that way when you're ready to go back. So, I'll see ya, Zack. I'll send you another mail when I find the time.
Dialogue: You do have an assignment waiting, don't you? Wouldn't it be quicker to go around just by yourself? The Shinra Building is straight ahead that way when you're ready to go back. So, I'll see ya, Zack. I'll send you another mail when I find the time.
trans: 你确实有任务在等，不是吗？

Original: Man: This is Sector 8. Lots of entertainment around here. You're in the fountain plaza. Beyond the clock tower is LOVELESS Avenue. You can climb up the stairs to go to the Sector 1 station. From the station, you can get on the train to go to the Sector 5 slums.
Dialogue: This is Sector 8. Lots of entertainment around here. You're in the fountain plaza. Beyond the clock tower is LOVELESS Avenue. You can climb up the stairs to go to the Sector 1 station. From the station, you can get on the train to go to the Sector 5 slums.
trans: 这是第 8 区。这里有很多娱乐活动。

Original: Infantryman: Lately, we're seeing more and more reporters sniffing around for a scoop on Shinra. I was chasing after one who had snuck into the building, but I seem to have lost sight of him. We can't allow confidential company information to leak out. I'll catch him no matter what it takes!
Dialogue: Lately, we're seeing more and more reporters sniffing around for a scoop on Shinra. I was chasing after one who had snuck into the building, but I seem to have lost sight of him. We can't allow confidential company information to leak out. I'll catch him no matter what it takes!
trans: 最近，我们看到越来越多的记者四处寻找神罗的独家新闻。

Original: Angeal Fan: Pardon me, but are you a SOLDIER operative?
Dialogue: Pardon me, but are you a SOLDIER operative?
trans: 不好意思，你是 SOLDIER 特工吗？

Original: Zack: I sure am. Zack's the name. Nice to meet you!
Dialogue: I sure am. Zack's the name. Nice to meet you!

Original: Sephiroth Fan: Zack? Never heard of you. You must be a SOLDIER second-rate.
Dialogue: Zack? Never heard of you. You must be a SOLDIER second-rate.

Original: Angeal Fan: We were just talking about who the greatest SOLDIER operative might be. I think it's Angeal. That air of solemnity about him... And he's thrifty to boot! He's absolutely charming.
Dialogue: We were just talking about who the greatest SOLDIER operative might be. I think it's Angeal. That air of solemnity about him... And he's thrifty to boot! He's absolutely charming.
trans: 我们只是在谈论谁可能是最伟大的 SOLDIER 特工。

Original: Sephiroth Fan: If we're talking about the greatest in SOLDIER, I can't think of anyone greater than Sephiroth. Just imagining him stripped to the waist makes me dizzy.
Dialogue: If we're talking about the greatest in SOLDIER, I can't think of anyone greater than Sephiroth. Just imagining him stripped to the waist makes me dizzy.
trans: 如果我们谈论 SOLDIER 中最伟大的，我想不出比 Sephiroth 更伟大的人了。

Original: Genesis Fan: Both of you! What are you talking about? It's got to be Genesis! There's no one greater in SOLDIER!
Dialogue: Both of you! What are you talking about? It's got to be Genesis! There's no one greater in SOLDIER!

Original: Zack: I never knew SOLDIER 1st Classes had so many female fans...
Dialogue: I never knew SOLDIER 1st Classes had so many female fans...
trans: 没想到SOLDIER 1st Classes竟然有那么多女粉丝。。。

Original: Genesis Fan: What makes Genesis's fan club so special is that we're well-funded compared to other fan clubs. We have a huge sponsor behind us. And we sell lots of merchandise, too. So what do you think? Would you like to become a member of Red Leather?
Dialogue: What makes Genesis's fan club so special is that we're well-funded compared to other fan clubs. We have a huge sponsor behind us. And we sell lots of merchandise, too. So what do you think? Would you like to become a member of Red Leather?
trans: Genesis 的粉丝俱乐部之所以如此特别，是因为与其他粉丝俱乐部相比，我们的资金充足。

Original: Zack: Genesis's fan club, huh?
Dialogue: Genesis's fan club, huh?
trans: 创世纪的粉丝俱乐部，嗯？

Original: Genesis Fan: New members are automatically entered into a chance to win a replica of Genesis's rapier. I think you just got your first mail from the club.
Dialogue: New members are automatically entered into a chance to win a replica of Genesis's rapier. I think you just got your first mail from the club.
trans: 新成员将自动获得赢得 Genesis 剑杆复制品的机会。

Original: Genesis Fan: We're now in an era where one's sense of style is becoming ever more important--even for SOLDIER. That's why Genesis, with his red leather coat and impeccable style, is leading Shinra into the future! As fans of Genesis, we should always strive to make our activities classy, streamlined, and stylish!
Dialogue: We're now in an era where one's sense of style is becoming ever more important--even for SOLDIER. That's why Genesis, with his red leather coat and impeccable style, is leading Shinra into the future! As fans of Genesis, we should always strive to make our activities classy, streamlined, and stylish!
trans: 我们现在处在一个人的风格感变得越来越重要的时代——即使对士兵来说也是如此。

Original: Angeal Fan: Say, how would you like to join Keepers of Honor, Angeal's fan club? If you join now, you'll get our recent newsletters that include bits of Angeal's official profile!
Dialogue: Say, how would you like to join Keepers of Honor, Angeal's fan club? If you join now, you'll get our recent newsletters that include bits of Angeal's official profile!
trans: 说吧，你想加入 Angeal 的粉丝俱乐部 Keepers of Honor 吗？

Original: Zack: Angeal's fan club, eh?
Dialogue: Angeal's fan club, eh?

Original: Angeal Fan: Congratulations! Welcome to the Keepers of Honor. And there you go. You just got your first newsletter.
Dialogue: Congratulations! Welcome to the Keepers of Honor. And there you go. You just got your first newsletter.

Original: Angeal Fan: We'll be focusing more on our activities. We don't want to lose to the Genesis or Sephiroth fans. Our activities shall be steadfast and honorable, just like Angeal himself!
Dialogue: We'll be focusing more on our activities. We don't want to lose to the Genesis or Sephiroth fans. Our activities shall be steadfast and honorable, just like Angeal himself!
trans: 我们将更加专注于我们的活动。

Original: Sephiroth Fan: The most popular figure in SOLDIER is the hero, Sephiroth. Which explains why he has so many fan clubs, from big to small, from the casual to the devoted. The key is to look for the one that suits you.
Dialogue: The most popular figure in SOLDIER is the hero, Sephiroth. Which explains why he has so many fan clubs, from big to small, from the casual to the devoted. The key is to look for the one that suits you.
trans: SOLDIER 中最受欢迎的人物是英雄 Sephiroth。

Original: Son: Angeal, Shmangeal! Mom's become a full-fledged groupie. She won't do anything around the house! ...C'mon, Mom. Grow up.
Dialogue: Angeal, Shmangeal! Mom's become a full-fledged groupie. She won't do anything around the house! ...C'mon, Mom. Grow up.

Original: Woman: I'm sorry. I'm not interested in a SOLDIER guy.
Dialogue: I'm sorry. I'm not interested in a SOLDIER guy.

Original: Man: Judging from your looks...you're a SOLDIER guy from Shinra, aren't you? I hate Shinra with all my heart. Don't talk to me like you know me.
Dialogue: Judging from your looks...you're a SOLDIER guy from Shinra, aren't you? I hate Shinra with all my heart. Don't talk to me like you know me.
trans: 从你的长相来看……你是神罗的士兵，对吧？

Original: Zack: Ahh, thanks for patrolling Midgar, my man.
Dialogue: Ahh, thanks for patrolling Midgar, my man.
trans: 啊，谢谢你在米德加巡逻，伙计。

Original: Captain: I don't recognize you from SOLDIER. What business do you have here?
Dialogue: I don't recognize you from SOLDIER. What business do you have here?

Original: Zack: Huh? Well, no business, actually...
Dialogue: Huh? Well, no business, actually...

Original: Captain: It is the duty of the 18th Squad in Shinra's Security Department to patrol the streets of Sector 8. Anyone who disturbs the peace will not be forgiven--not even SOLDIER.
Dialogue: It is the duty of the 18th Squad in Shinra's Security Department to patrol the streets of Sector 8. Anyone who disturbs the peace will not be forgiven--not even SOLDIER.
trans: 神罗安全部第 18 小队的职责是在第 8 区的街道上巡逻。任何扰乱和平的人都不会被原谅——即使是士兵。

Original: Zack: Whoa, whoa, take it easy there.
Dialogue: Whoa, whoa, take it easy there.

Original: Captain: This is the perfect opportunity for me to tell you something. Midgar does not need SOLDIER.
Dialogue: This is the perfect opportunity for me to tell you something. Midgar does not need SOLDIER.
trans: 这是我告诉你一些事情的绝佳机会。

Original: Zack: What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: Captain: Whose job is it to take lost children to their mothers? Whose job is it to catch the petty crooks who steal small change from vending machines? Whose job is it to scold the young girls who talk too loud on the trains? They are all ours. In other words, Midgar needs nobody but us--Shinra's Security Department.
Dialogue: Whose job is it to take lost children to their mothers? Whose job is it to catch the petty crooks who steal small change from vending machines? Whose job is it to scold the young girls who talk too loud on the trains? They are all ours. In other words, Midgar needs nobody but us--Shinra's Security Department.
trans: 把走失的孩子带给他们的母亲是谁的工作？

Original: Zack: And I can see that you're, uh, doing fine work.
Dialogue: And I can see that you're, uh, doing fine work.
trans: 而且我可以看到你，呃，做得很好。

Original: Captain: Hmph. That's as cocky as you're going to be. We'll be holding a joint training session soon. Security versus SOLDIER. We'll see who the true combat elites are.
Dialogue: Hmph. That's as cocky as you're going to be. We'll be holding a joint training session soon. Security versus SOLDIER. We'll see who the true combat elites are.

Original: Captain: Hmph. The days of SOLDIER and the Turks getting all the attention are over. Our joint training will let you see the true powers we possess in the Security Department.
Dialogue: Hmph. The days of SOLDIER and the Turks getting all the attention are over. Our joint training will let you see the true powers we possess in the Security Department.

Original: Man: This is LOVELESS Avenue, the busiest part of Sector 8. LOVELESS is a literary masterpiece. They've even made it into a play.
Dialogue: This is LOVELESS Avenue, the busiest part of Sector 8. LOVELESS is a literary masterpiece. They've even made it into a play.
trans: 这里是LOVELESS大道，Sector 8最繁华的地段。LOVELESS是一部文学名著。

Original: Employee: Oh, hello, Mister SOLDIER. Sorry, but I'm not interested. I already have someone in my heart.
Dialogue: Oh, hello, Mister SOLDIER. Sorry, but I'm not interested. I already have someone in my heart.

Original: Genesis Fan: LOVELESS... A tale of doomed love and friendship... It's a fascinating tale that's even been made into a successful stage production every year. I'm a member of the Study Group, one of the Genesis fan clubs. We study LOVELESS in order to gain deeper insight into the work that Genesis loves so much. Our members used to be in Red Leather, the other Genesis fan club. But we grew tired of how shallow they were, so we decided to spin off and form the Study Group. Would you like to join the Study Group and learn how truly wonderful LOVELESS is?
Dialogue: LOVELESS... A tale of doomed love and friendship... It's a fascinating tale that's even been made into a successful stage production every year. I'm a member of the Study Group, one of the Genesis fan clubs. We study LOVELESS in order to gain deeper insight into the work that Genesis loves so much. Our members used to be in Red Leather, the other Genesis fan club. But we grew tired of how shallow they were, so we decided to spin off and form the Study Group. Would you like to join the Study Group and learn how truly wonderful LOVELESS is?
trans: LOVELESS... 一个注定失败的爱情和友谊的故事... 这是一个引人入胜的故事，甚至每年都被成功搬上舞台剧。

Original: Zack: The LOVELESS Study Group?
Dialogue: The LOVELESS Study Group?

Original: Genesis Fan: Congratulations! You have now been accepted as a fellow worshipper of LOVELESS. Oh! I think you just got a mail. Why don't you take a look at it?
Dialogue: Congratulations! You have now been accepted as a fellow worshipper of LOVELESS. Oh! I think you just got a mail. Why don't you take a look at it?

Original: Genesis Fan: LOVELESS has five acts, but the final act has been lost and nobody knows its contents. Acts 2 and 3, though, have practically become classics. They've made it onto the stage, after all. In certain circles, our dear Genesis is famous as a devotee to LOVELESS.
Dialogue: LOVELESS has five acts, but the final act has been lost and nobody knows its contents. Acts 2 and 3, though, have practically become classics. They've made it onto the stage, after all. In certain circles, our dear Genesis is famous as a devotee to LOVELESS.
trans: LOVELESS有五幕，但最后一幕已经丢失，没有人知道它的内容。

Original: Man: This little puppy can hit 140MPH, y'know. The engine's great, of course, but the secret's in the tires.
Dialogue: This little puppy can hit 140MPH, y'know. The engine's great, of course, but the secret's in the tires.
trans: 这只小狗可以达到 140MPH，你知道的。

Original: Man: S-S-SOLDIER!? N-n-nothing. It's nothing! I-I-I'm a civi-civi-civilian! And I'm very busy! Don't talk to me!
Dialogue: S-S-SOLDIER!? N-n-nothing. It's nothing! I-I-I'm a civi-civi-civilian! And I'm very busy! Don't talk to me!

Original: Girl: I came here to watch the Shinra trains with my brother. I hope it comes soon! Hee-hee!
Dialogue: I came here to watch the Shinra trains with my brother. I hope it comes soon! Hee-hee!
trans: 我来这里是为了和我哥哥一起看神罗列车。

Original: Boy: Shinra's new locomotive is pulling in soon! It's called the MK93 II. Oooh, I can't wait to see it! He-hee!
Dialogue: Shinra's new locomotive is pulling in soon! It's called the MK93 II. Oooh, I can't wait to see it! He-hee!
trans: 神罗的新机车即将启动！

Original: Employeee: I've been waiting for the train to come for a long time now. The delays have become frequent of late.
Dialogue: I've been waiting for the train to come for a long time now. The delays have become frequent of late.
trans: 我等火车来已经很久了。

Original: Employee: You can use the train to go to the slums market in Sector 5. Once the train comes, that is. Hmmm, I hope it comes soon...
Dialogue: You can use the train to go to the slums market in Sector 5. Once the train comes, that is. Hmmm, I hope it comes soon...
trans: 您可以乘坐火车前往第 5 区的贫民窟市场。一旦火车来了，就是这样。

Original: Employee: We currently have a special on potions. There is a fee for the general public, but they are free to SOLDIER members and Shinra troops. Would you like to try a bottle, sir?
Dialogue: We currently have a special on potions. There is a fee for the general public, but they are free to SOLDIER members and Shinra troops. Would you like to try a bottle, sir?
trans: 我们目前有一个特殊的药水。

Original: Zack: A potion, eh?
Dialogue: A potion, eh?

Original: Man: I was worried when my son wandered off and got lost inside the building. Thank goodness the young lady at the Information Center was able to help me. You can count on the Shinra Company to offer service with a smile!
Dialogue: I was worried when my son wandered off and got lost inside the building. Thank goodness the young lady at the Information Center was able to help me. You can count on the Shinra Company to offer service with a smile!
trans: 当我儿子走失并在建筑物内迷路时，我很担心。

Original: Man: I brought my boy here for a tour inside. It's important to provide children with opportunities to see the world. And I'm glad to see that he's enjoying himself.
Dialogue: I brought my boy here for a tour inside. It's important to provide children with opportunities to see the world. And I'm glad to see that he's enjoying himself.
trans: 我带我的男孩来这里参观。

Original: Boy: Wow! The Shinra Building! It's my first time here.
Dialogue: Wow! The Shinra Building! It's my first time here.

Original: Boy: I can't believe how huge it is! Do you ever get lost in this place?
Dialogue: I can't believe how huge it is! Do you ever get lost in this place?

Original: Receptionist: Oh, hello. Let me know if you need anything. (Hey, he's pretty cute...)
Dialogue: Oh, hello. Let me know if you need anything. (Hey, he's pretty cute...)

Original: Receptionist: So you're a SOLDIER operative, huh? It must be exciting, going on all those missions. (Oh my. He can't stop coming up to me to chat.) (Oh, well. I can't help it if I'm such a stud magnet.)
Dialogue: So you're a SOLDIER operative, huh? It must be exciting, going on all those missions. (Oh my. He can't stop coming up to me to chat.) (Oh, well. I can't help it if I'm such a stud magnet.)
trans: 所以你是一名士兵特工，对吧？

Original: Receptionist: Good day, sir. Welcome to the Shinra Building Information Center. Please come see me anytime you have questions concerning the Shinra Building.
Dialogue: Good day, sir. Welcome to the Shinra Building Information Center. Please come see me anytime you have questions concerning the Shinra Building.

Original: Zack: Hmmm, what do I need to know?
Dialogue: Hmmm, what do I need to know?

Original: Receptionist: Zack Fair, SOLDIER. One moment, please. ... You have a meeting scheduled with Mr. Tseng in the Briefing Room.
Dialogue: Zack Fair, SOLDIER. One moment, please. ... You have a meeting scheduled with Mr. Tseng in the Briefing Room.

Original: Receptionist: The Shinra Building is a secure area. Access to all areas is controlled by employee ID. Members of SOLDIER have access to the elevator, the Exhibit Room, and the SOLDIER floor. Please be aware that the Exhibit Room and this entrance area are open to the public.
Dialogue: The Shinra Building is a secure area. Access to all areas is controlled by employee ID. Members of SOLDIER have access to the elevator, the Exhibit Room, and the SOLDIER floor. Please be aware that the Exhibit Room and this entrance area are open to the public.

Original: Receptionist: Exiting the building takes you to Sector 8. You may find it refreshing to venture out to Sector 8 while on standby. Also, there is a train station in Sector 1, where you may board the train to go to the slums in Sector 5.
Dialogue: Exiting the building takes you to Sector 8. You may find it refreshing to venture out to Sector 8 while on standby. Also, there is a train station in Sector 1, where you may board the train to go to the slums in Sector 5.
trans: 离开大楼将带您前往第 8 区。您可能会发现在待命的情况下冒险前往第 8 区会令人耳目一新。

Original: Infantryman: Sir! I am a newly recruited infantryman, sir! I am committed to giving everything I have for the Shinra Company, sir!
Dialogue: Sir! I am a newly recruited infantryman, sir! I am committed to giving everything I have for the Shinra Company, sir!

Original: Infantryman: You can go to Sector 8 by exiting the building, sir! It is our duty to maintain the peace, not only in the Shinra Building, but throughout the city of Midgar, sir!
Dialogue: You can go to Sector 8 by exiting the building, sir! It is our duty to maintain the peace, not only in the Shinra Building, but throughout the city of Midgar, sir!
trans: 先生，您可以离开大楼前往第 8 区！

Original: Employee: Blast it. I'm on the wrong floor again. Could the Shinra Company have possibly built a more convoluted building? I mean, how could a building as giant as this only have two elevators? It's ridiculous.
Dialogue: Blast it. I'm on the wrong floor again. Could the Shinra Company have possibly built a more convoluted building? I mean, how could a building as giant as this only have two elevators? It's ridiculous.

Original: Sign: Shinra #26 Rocket
Dialogue: Shinra #26 Rocket

Original: Employee: This is a conceptual model of the Shinra No. 26 rocket. Shinra has concentrated all its science into the Space Development Department for this project. Once it's completed, all that would be left is to launch it into outer space.
Dialogue: This is a conceptual model of the Shinra No. 26 rocket. Shinra has concentrated all its science into the Space Development Department for this project. Once it's completed, all that would be left is to launch it into outer space.
trans: 这是神罗26号火箭的概念模型。

Original: Sign: Shinra Model sA-37
Dialogue: Shinra Model sA-37

Original: Sign: Airship Highwind
Dialogue: Airship Highwind

Original: Man: I came as soon as I heard the Exhibit Room was open to the public. Being in this room gives you a sense of the Shinra Company's achievements.
Dialogue: I came as soon as I heard the Exhibit Room was open to the public. Being in this room gives you a sense of the Shinra Company's achievements.
trans: 一听说展览室对公众开放，我就赶来了。

Original: Sign: Hardy-Daytona
Dialogue: Hardy-Daytona

Original: Man: What can I do to make her realize my feelings for... Ah!? I-I-I didn't say anything!
Dialogue: What can I do to make her realize my feelings for... Ah!? I-I-I didn't say anything!
trans: 我该怎么做才能让她意识到我对……啊！的感情？

Original: Man: Her dark, lovely eyes... Her soft, shiny hair... Oh, gods. Just give me the strength to talk to her...
Dialogue: Her dark, lovely eyes... Her soft, shiny hair... Oh, gods. Just give me the strength to talk to her...
trans: 她乌黑可爱的眼睛……她柔软闪亮的头发……哦，天哪。

Original: Sign: Shinra Model pA-86
Dialogue: Shinra Model pA-86

Original: Employee: The Exhibit Room is open to the public. You are asked to refrain any conduct that would inconvenience our visitors.
Dialogue: The Exhibit Room is open to the public. You are asked to refrain any conduct that would inconvenience our visitors.

Original: Employee: That gentleman over there has been staring in my direction for a while now. Do you think he's...all right? This is starting to get creepy.
Dialogue: That gentleman over there has been staring in my direction for a while now. Do you think he's...all right? This is starting to get creepy.
trans: 那边的那位先生已经盯着我的方向看了一会儿了。

Original: Kunsel: Hey, Zack. Finally made it back, did you? Weren't you in the middle of an assignment? You should get going. The Turks guy is waiting for you in the briefing room.
Dialogue: Hey, Zack. Finally made it back, did you? Weren't you in the middle of an assignment? You should get going. The Turks guy is waiting for you in the briefing room.

Original: Zack: Oh yeah, the assignment!
Dialogue: Oh yeah, the assignment!

Original: Kunsel: Are you kidding me...? The briefing room... Is right there, you can see it from here. Are you feeling all right? Just hurry up and go, Zack. Good luck on the assignment. I'll send you a mail again when I have the time.
Dialogue: Are you kidding me...? The briefing room... Is right there, you can see it from here. Are you feeling all right? Just hurry up and go, Zack. Good luck on the assignment. I'll send you a mail again when I have the time.

Original: Kunsel: Good luck on the assignment. I'll send you a mail again when I have the time.
Dialogue: Good luck on the assignment. I'll send you a mail again when I have the time.

Original: SOLDIER 3rd Class: First Genesis, and now even Angeal's gone... A lot's gone down in SOLDIER of late.
Dialogue: First Genesis, and now even Angeal's gone... A lot's gone down in SOLDIER of late.
trans: First Genesis，现在连 Angeal 都不在了……最近在 SOLDIER 中发生了很多事情。

Original: SOLDIER 3rd Class: But don't let those things get to you, Zack. I'm sure Angeal will come back to us soon.
Dialogue: But don't let those things get to you, Zack. I'm sure Angeal will come back to us soon.
trans: 但是扎克，不要让这些事情影响到你。

Original: SOLDIER 2nd Class: If you take that elevator, you can go down to the entrance nd the Exhibit Room. One of the girls at the Information Center is pretty cute, you know.
Dialogue: If you take that elevator, you can go down to the entrance nd the Exhibit Room. One of the girls at the Information Center is pretty cute, you know.
trans: 如果你乘坐那部电梯，你可以下到入口和展览室。

Original: SOLDIER 2nd Class: You can also take the elevator up to the SOLDIER director's office. It's more like Director Lazard's personal office. You can't go up there unless you've got real business.
Dialogue: You can also take the elevator up to the SOLDIER director's office. It's more like Director Lazard's personal office. You can't go up there unless you've got real business.
trans: 你也可以乘电梯到 SOLDIER 主管办公室。

Original: SOLDIER 3rd Class: Have you noticed all the rooms on this floor? We have the Briefing Room, the Materia Room, and the Training Room. All these facilities provided by Shinra, just for us. It's good to be in SOLDIER!
Dialogue: Have you noticed all the rooms on this floor? We have the Briefing Room, the Materia Room, and the Training Room. All these facilities provided by Shinra, just for us. It's good to be in SOLDIER!
trans: 你注意到这一层所有的房间了吗？

Original: SOLDIER 3rd Class: The Materia Room is for conducting research and development on materia. Have you been there yet?
Dialogue: The Materia Room is for conducting research and development on materia. Have you been there yet?
trans: 材料室用于进行材料的研究和开发。

Original: SOLDIER 2nd Class: Hey, Zack. I hear you were quite the hero in the Wutai operation. They say you must have taken out a thousand Wutai soldiers in Fort Tamblin. But I'm next in line to become 1st Class! Don't you forget it.
Dialogue: Hey, Zack. I hear you were quite the hero in the Wutai operation. They say you must have taken out a thousand Wutai soldiers in Fort Tamblin. But I'm next in line to become 1st Class! Don't you forget it.

Original: SOLDIER 2nd Class: With Genesis and Angeal missing, there's a spot for a 1st to be filled. Looks like my time has come. But keep quiet about it. It's not the type of thing to spread around.
Dialogue: With Genesis and Angeal missing, there's a spot for a 1st to be filled. Looks like my time has come. But keep quiet about it. It's not the type of thing to spread around.
trans: 由于缺少 Genesis 和 Angeal，所以有一个位置可以填补 1st。

Original: Researcher (1): Materia is the concentrated essence of mako energy. But natural materia is practically nonexistent. That's because special conditions must be met, in addition to the long years it takes to form. Most of the materia out there was generated by either us or the Arms Development Department.
Dialogue: Materia is the concentrated essence of mako energy. But natural materia is practically nonexistent. That's because special conditions must be met, in addition to the long years it takes to form. Most of the materia out there was generated by either us or the Arms Development Department.
trans: Materia 是 Mako 能量的浓缩精华。

Original: Researcher (2): Naturally-formed materia are extremely rare, but "mako stones" are relatively easy to obtain. A mako stone is crystallized materia made of concentrated mako energy. By itself, it doesn't have the same effect as materia, but we can process it into materia. SOLDIER members occasionally go out excavating for them. Maybe you should, too.
Dialogue: Naturally-formed materia are extremely rare, but "mako stones" are relatively easy to obtain. A mako stone is crystallized materia made of concentrated mako energy. By itself, it doesn't have the same effect as materia, but we can process it into materia. SOLDIER members occasionally go out excavating for them. Maybe you should, too.
trans: 天然形成的物质极其稀有，但“魔晃石”相对容易获得。

Original: Researcher (2): SOLDIER members occasionally go out excavating for them. Maybe you should, too. If you bring your mako stone in, we can make it into materia for you.
Dialogue: SOLDIER members occasionally go out excavating for them. Maybe you should, too. If you bring your mako stone in, we can make it into materia for you.
trans: SOLDIER 成员偶尔会出去为他们挖掘。

Original: Researcher (2): Wait! What do you have there? Is that a sample of XXX Mako Stone!? If you'd hand that over to us, we can generate materia out of it!
Dialogue: Wait! What do you have there? Is that a sample of XXX Mako Stone!? If you'd hand that over to us, we can generate materia out of it!

Original: Researcher (2): If you'd like, you're welcome to stay and watch us generate materia.
Dialogue: If you'd like, you're welcome to stay and watch us generate materia.
trans: 如果你愿意，欢迎你留下来观看我们生成魔石。

Original: Researcher (2): Commencing materia generation! All hands! Confirm status!
Dialogue: Commencing materia generation! All hands! Confirm status!

Original: Researcher (3): Ready, sir!
Dialogue: Ready, sir!

Original: Researcher (1): Main engine on standby! Ready when you are!
Dialogue: Main engine on standby! Ready when you are!

Original: Researcher (2): Main engine, start! Report mako energy concentration rate!
Dialogue: Main engine, start! Report mako energy concentration rate!

Original: Researcher (3): Concentration rate at 20...30...40... Steady at 50%, sir!
Dialogue: Concentration rate at 20...30...40... Steady at 50%, sir!

Original: Researcher (2): Increase main engine output! The first 30 seconds into concentration is crucial!
Dialogue: Increase main engine output! The first 30 seconds into concentration is crucial!

Original: Researcher (1): Aye-aye, sir! Output, 80% and rising!
Dialogue: Aye-aye, sir! Output, 80% and rising!

Original: Researcher (3): Concentration rate isn't budging, sir!
Dialogue: Concentration rate isn't budging, sir!

Original: Researcher (2): Grrr! Ready cooling system! Increase mako energy output to maximum!
Dialogue: Grrr! Ready cooling system! Increase mako energy output to maximum!

Original: Researcher (1): Output at 120%! 1 minute left till we reach the critical point!
Dialogue: Output at 120%! 1 minute left till we reach the critical point!

Original: Researcher (3): Mako energy concentration rate is rising! 70...80...90% and still going up!
Dialogue: Mako energy concentration rate is rising! 70...80...90% and still going up!

Original: Researcher (2): All right! Hang on, we're almost there!
Dialogue: All right! Hang on, we're almost there!

Original: Researcher (3): Concentration rate, 100%!
Dialogue: Concentration rate, 100%!

Original: Researcher (2): Stop main engine!
Dialogue: Stop main engine!

Original: Researcher (1): Main engine stop confirmed! Gentlemen, we have our materia!!!
Dialogue: Main engine stop confirmed! Gentlemen, we have our materia!!!

Original: Researcher (2): Here's the materia. And none too shabby! It was made from your mako stone, so this materia is yours. It's actually been a while since we made any materia here in the Materia Room. We have our share of problems, too.
Dialogue: Here's the materia. And none too shabby! It was made from your mako stone, so this materia is yours. It's actually been a while since we made any materia here in the Materia Room. We have our share of problems, too.

Original: Researcher (2): What? You don't get why we were so on edge during the generation process? Well, we have to get psyched up! Materia generation does take quite a bit of mental concentration.
Dialogue: What? You don't get why we were so on edge during the generation process? Well, we have to get psyched up! Materia generation does take quite a bit of mental concentration.

Original: Researcher (2): Thanks to you, we had the opportunity to make a new materia. Your name was... Zack, right? We'll remember you.
Dialogue: Thanks to you, we had the opportunity to make a new materia. Your name was... Zack, right? We'll remember you.
trans: 多亏了你，我们才有机会制作新的材料。

Original: Researcher (2): Zack, we hope to see you again.
Dialogue: Zack, we hope to see you again.
trans: 扎克，我们希望再次见到你。

Original: Researcher (2): You're Zack, right? I remember you. You're someone we've come to depend on. But we have to let you know that we may never be able to work again...
Dialogue: You're Zack, right? I remember you. You're someone we've come to depend on. But we have to let you know that we may never be able to work again...

Original: Researcher (2): Discussions are taking place about closing down our Materia Room. The sad truth is that our materia quality hasn't been very good. *sigh* What am I going to do when I'm let go? Who would hire someone like me?
Dialogue: Discussions are taking place about closing down our Materia Room. The sad truth is that our materia quality hasn't been very good. *sigh* What am I going to do when I'm let go? Who would hire someone like me?
trans: 正在讨论关闭我们的 Materia Room。

Original: Researcher (3): I used to be in the Science Department. I was transferred here around the time Director Lazard came to head SOLDIER. Actually, I guess you could say that I was headhunted from the Science Department.
Dialogue: I used to be in the Science Department. I was transferred here around the time Director Lazard came to head SOLDIER. Actually, I guess you could say that I was headhunted from the Science Department.

Original: Researcher: Taking physical fitness tests is an important duty for a SOLDIER operative. Since all SOLDIER members are infused with mako, we need to manage their health with extreme care.
Dialogue: Taking physical fitness tests is an important duty for a SOLDIER operative. Since all SOLDIER members are infused with mako, we need to manage their health with extreme care.
trans: 参加体能测试是士兵特工的一项重要职责。

Original: Researcher: Professor Hojo of the Science Department drops by this room now and then. After all, he's the one who operates on guys like you to become SOLDIER members. To be honest, though...I wish he wouldn't come.
Dialogue: Professor Hojo of the Science Department drops by this room now and then. After all, he's the one who operates on guys like you to become SOLDIER members. To be honest, though...I wish he wouldn't come.
trans: 科学系的北条教授时不时来这间屋子。

Original: Researcher: This is the Training Room, where we gauge the physical fitness of SOLDIER members. You're Zack, SOLDIER 2nd Class, right? Yes, we'll be testing your physical fitness someday. I hope to see you then.
Dialogue: This is the Training Room, where we gauge the physical fitness of SOLDIER members. You're Zack, SOLDIER 2nd Class, right? Yes, we'll be testing your physical fitness someday. I hope to see you then.
trans: 这是训练室，我们在这里测量 SOLDIER 成员的体能。

Original: Tseng: Ready to go on the assignment?
Dialogue: Ready to go on the assignment?

Original: Tseng: Hurry up.
Dialogue: Hurry up.

Original: Tseng: Very good, then.
Dialogue: Very good, then.

Original: Tseng: Ready to go?
Dialogue: Ready to go?

Original: Zack: A routine job, right? No sweat!
Dialogue: A routine job, right? No sweat!

Original: Tseng: I wonder... Originally, Sephiroth was assigned to this mission. That means it's a top-priority matter. Be alert, or you'll fail.
Dialogue: I wonder... Originally, Sephiroth was assigned to this mission. That means it's a top-priority matter. Be alert, or you'll fail.
trans: 不知……原来，萨菲罗斯是被派去执行这个任务的。

Original: Zack: And Sephiroth?
Dialogue: And Sephiroth?
